examples: His constant joking was beginning to annoy her.
Su constante broma comenzaba a molestarla.
I’m sure she does it just to annoy me.
Estoy seguro de que lo hace solo para molestarme.
I only stay out late to annoy my parents.
Solo me quedo hasta tarde para molestar a mis padres.
It really annoys me when people forget to say thank you.
Realmente me molesta cuando la gente se olvida de dar las gracias.
